title: Ep. 671 Fight Back. Start Dancing!
description:
In this episode I discuss how the tide is turning in the liberal culture war. I also address outrageous liberal hypocrisy on the firearm issue and other subjects.
 

News Picks:
Liberals want to ban guns but consistently embarrass and discredit themselves by having little to no understanding of the firearms they want to ban.
 
A university instituted a policy allowing concealed carry on campus. Here’s what happened to crime rates.
 
This piece discusses the data on the opioid epidemic.
 
Are we going to see a second special counsel to investigate the Obamagate spying scandal? 
 
More devastating information about the failure of liberal cities.
 
Is President Trump’s tariff talk a negotiating ploy? 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
